Description: The settlement also covered claims relating to employees of JohnsonDiversey, which used to be owned by SC Johnson. The dollar amount listed here refers only to the SC Johnson portion.
Private Litigation Case Title: Thompson et al v. Retirement Plan For Employees of SC Johnson & Sons Inc.

Info Source: Contained in data obtained from the agency on October 6, 2020 in response to an open records request.
